original_title: 怨霊ノ家 呪界地獄入ルの恐怖
overview: In the tower that points out that it is the origin of all urban legends, it follows the horror directors Miki Hatano, Ayako Koito, and Kiyotaka Taguchi. A bizarre old woman with inspiration gathers everyone to the Koito family and thinks about countermeasures... In the Koito family, which has become a locked room, can old women find a mystery of the cause in the rampage appearance of vengeful ghosts.
title: Vengeful Spirit House: Fear of Entering the Curse of Hell
